name: February 26 Incident
description:
A historical strategy game about February 26 Incident (二・二六事件) .

The game is still in the "playground" stage. You can command “young officers” (青年将校) to purge their objectives and "call" government force to enter.

Control:

* Click the right-top time dialog to run the game at a given speed.

* Right-dragging and scrolling the mouse wheel to control the camera.

* Left-click on map sprite to select a stack.

* Left-click on the bottom unit bar to select units or leaders.

* Right-click on the map to attack, move or detach a unit.

* Right-click on a unit in the unit bar to combine two units.

* Bottom-right comes with many "playground" (aka. debug) options to play with as well.

GitHub: https://github.com/yiyuezhuo/February-26-Incident
